data.text: @Melanie46902204 Hey Melanie. I understand that you would like a monetary refund but we are unable to process this. We wanted to provide additional flexibility to those customers who have non-refundable fares. As such we can only provide a voucher to the value of your booking. Thanks - Chichi

@Melanie46902204 Hi @Melanie46902204. Thank you for reaching out, sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled. If you’ve already opted for a voucher, we’re unable to convert it to cash. Cash refunds are only available in specific circumstances. Thanks – Dan

urls.title: Contact us | Jetstar
urls.description: Need to get in touch with Jetstar? Select the issue that's most relevant to you and we'll point you toward the best way to contact us.

data.text: @smashman42 Hi @smashman42. Sorry to hear you’re having trouble accessing our website. I would suggest getting in touch with our Telephone reservations at 131 538 or chat with our Live Chat team here: https://t.co/Sw1nTYaKDq - Jay

data.text: @neotericsufi Hi Aviram, I'm sorry to hear that you haven't received your Qantas points refund. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking details? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jay
@HopBuddyHop Hi Buhdee, We expect all our team members to be professional and polite and I'm sincerely sorry that this wasn’t your experience. I do appreciate your feedback. - Ralph.

urls.title: COVID-related flight changes and cancellations | Jetstar
urls.description: With travel restrictions changing regularly due to COVID-19, you may need to change your travel plans. Check your options for flexible flying here.

data.text: @kateeekins Hi Kate. If you book a Starter Fare and your flight will be affected by border restriction changes and meets the criteria outlined here: https://t.co/q3GZceC0oZ, you will be eligible for a credit voucher. Thanks - Chichi
@AndrewRLP I understand you're concern regarding the refund Andrew and we'd like to discuss this to you over DM. If you could send us a message, we can get this started. Thanks - Chichi

@AndrewRLP Hey Andrew, I can tell you're frustrated and I'm sorry if you felt I'm not as helpful. We’d love the chance to chat with you about this and see what we can do. If you need to discuss a specific booking with us, feel free to send us a DM here. Thanks - Norine

@AndrewRLP Hi Andrew, I understand this must be upsetting for you and I'm sorry if you felt it that way. Would you mind sending us a DM here? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Norine

@KathrynOleary2 Hi Kathryn, I'm sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled. While we understand why you'd rather get a cash refund this time, we can only process it back to your original mode of payment. Please send us a DM if you need further assistance with your booking. Thanks - Jaya

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text: @chrissyd1984 Hi Topher84, we’re here to help! You’ll always be eligible for a credit voucher for the full value of your booking if your Jetstar flight is affected by border restriction changes. You can stay up to date via our Travel Alerts page here - https://t.co/9NQ0MQVJYe. Thanks - Jay

@David16969665 Hi David, we’re here to help! You’ll always be eligible for a credit voucher for the full value of your booking if your Jetstar Airways flight is cancelled or affected by border restriction changes. If you need to discuss a specific booking Dm us Thanks – Ralph

@Rhimeowmeow Hello there, we know how inconvenient canceled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. We'd like to check this further for you, can you please send us a DM of your booking reference number and complete name, please? -Lee
@leeleeC10 Hi Lee. Thanks for your feedback. We'l pass this on to the relevant team for review. Thanks - Chichi
@MsLamingtons Hi Ms Lamingtons, That’s the kind of feedback we love to hear. You're welcome and we hope to see you again onboard. Cheers - Norine

@pensandphotos Hi Christie. I apologise if you weren’t updated on what was happening with your flight. Once a flight is delayed, it can be hard for us to predict  how long the disruption will last. If you need further assistance with your booking, kindly send us a DM. Thanks - Chichi
@Tim99043159 Hi Tim, you can send us a Direct Message (DM) here on Twitter by simply clicking on the message icon on our Page. Thank you -Lee
@Tim99043159 I appreciate where you are coming from Tim. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking details to assist. Thanks - Jay

@Tim99043159 Hi Tim. I'm sorry to hear that you are unhappy with the voucher. If you’ve already opted for a voucher, we’re unable to convert it to cash. Cash refunds are only available in specific circumstances. If you need to discuss a specific booking, you may send us a DM. Thanks – Jay
@jessdotceee Hey Jess, There’s nothing we like more than hearing that one of our passengers has had a great experience. Thanks for letting us know! We’ll definitely pass this. - Dan
@jessdotceee I recognise your situation Jess. To explain this further for you, kindly send us a DM. Thanks - Chichi

@friggenawesome Hey @friggenawesome, Congratulations to your newborn baby. There’s nothing we like more than hearing that one of our passengers has had a great flight experience. Thanks for letting us know! - Ryan

data.text: @jessdotceee Hi Jess, I certainly understand travelling at this time can really be stressful due to the Covid 19 situation. You’ll be eligible for a credit voucher if your flight is affected by border restriction changes. Please send us a DM so we can assist you further. Thanks - Jaya

@hisnameispatch Hi @hisnameispatch, thank you for reaching out. A voucher will always be an option if your Jetstar Airways flight is cancelled or affected by border restriction changes. Cash refunds are only available in specific circumstances. Thanks – Dan

@DallasSmith666 Hi Dallas, we understand how important this is to you. We have ongoing maintenance to our 'My Wallet' feature. For now, we suggest checking your voucher details via our Voucher Balance Portal here:  https://t.co/yCa3RqkX6k - we appreciate your patience. Thanks - Jaya
@MaryklivP Hi Mary, sorry to hear that. We'd like to assist you with this. Please send us a DM to further check this for you. Thanks - Jaya

@eliasrecruit1 Hi there, sorry to hear that. I understand that you want to speak to the same representative however, we don't have a way to do that on our end. Please chat with them again here: https://t.co/s8CpDlvPvA -  to further assist you.  Thanks - Jaya

@ilanjbloom Hi Ilan, I understand that you prefer a refund. If you’ve already opted for a voucher, we’re unable to convert it to cash. Cash refunds are only available in specific circumstances. Feel free to send us a DM if you need to discuss a specific booking. Thanks - Leslie
@miabartos1 Hi Mia, sorry to hear your flight has been cancelled. Please send us a DM so we can look into your options and assist. Thanks - Leslie

@clammm_ Hi Cam, we’re offering credit vouchers to customers affected by border restrictions who have purchased non-refundable fares. If your flight is cancelled by us, you may also be eligible for a refund depending on the circumstances. Thanks - Leslie

@tomtomsydney We appreciate your feedback on this matter, TC. We are constantly re-assessing the situation and if there's option for us to extend a Club Jetstar Membership, we'll let you know via email. Thanks - Ryan

data.text: @tomtomsydney Hi TC, I know that the current situation causes some changes in our travel plans. An email notification is sent 4 weeks prior to your Club Jetstar Membership expires. You can opt-out the auto-renewal by clicking here: https://t.co/pVpoc8gsAE Thanks - Ryan

data.text: @over45useless Hi @over45useless. Thank you for reaching out, we know travel might be a little tricky right now. However - we’re doing this so we can start planning out your next trips when everything’s a little more back to normal. - Dan

@LennaLeprena Hi Lenna, there's been an ongoing system update for ''My wallet'' that's why it's been suspended for now. I highly advised you to keep your vouchers with you in the meantime and you can check their balance and details via this portal https://t.co/ikcvG6TwOd. Thank you! -Lee
@LennaLeprena Hi Lenna. We do apologise for any inconvenience, you can check your voucher balance and expiry date here https://t.co/IZdsCXMx81. Hope to see you on board soon! Thanks – Dan

@AltrdC Hi @AltrdC, I understand that extra costs can be frustrating. We can’t weigh passengers, so we stick to the carry-on baggage for now! If your carry-on is over the weight limit, you’ll still have to pay an excess baggage fee. If you need to discuss a booking send us a DM. - Ralph.
@Venus4828 We'll keep you posted via our websites as we are still finalizing everything. Thank you -Lee
@Venus4828 Hi Venus,  as we are still reviewing our network on a daily basis, flights for July 2022 may not be posted yet. You can check on it from time to time. Thank you -Lee
@OliviaSPM Hi @OliviaSPM. Thank you for reaching out, sorry to hear that your  flight was changed. We'd like to look into this for you, please send us a Direct Message. Thanks - Dan
@ledmunds21 Hi Luke, we’re so glad to hear your feedback about your voucher extension. Hope to see you board with us in the future. - Thanks, Ralph.

@EEveryman888 Hi Edward, I know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and I understand you preferred a cash refund rather than a voucher. Would you mind sending us a DM here? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Norine
@DallasSmith666 Hi thanks for your tweet. I'm sorry to hear about what happened. Please contact us directly via DM with your full name to assist you further. Thanks - Chichi
@joshlgomez96 Hi Josh, I appreciate that your plans for booking have changed. Can you send us a DM so we can assist you further on this? Thanks - Bree

@mstanbis Hi Maxwell, I appreciate you're unhappy about this. Fares are subject to change any time. If you have a specific booking you need to discuss, you may send us a DM here so we can assist you. Thanks - Bree
@41st_7th Hi Nikki, thanks for reaching out. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this. Thanks - Leslie

data.text: @ourmaizcay Hi there, I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. If your flight is impacted, we provide a range of options and that may include a one-time free move of your flight. Feel free to send us a DM if you require further assistance. Thanks – Jaya

@DallasSmith666 Hi @DallasSmith666, I'm sorry to hear about the difficulty accessing your voucher. Would you mind sending us a DM (Direct Message)? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this for you. Thanks – Ralph.

@WeveAllGotToEat Hi there, sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled. We'd like to check your options here. Please send us a DM with your booking reference and full name so we can assist you further. Thanks - Jaya
@kniesel Hi Kniesel, we’d love the chance to chat with you about this and see what we can do. Could you please send us a DM here? Thanks - Norine

data.text: @sophiej_bailey Hi Sophie, we understand that border restrictions continue to evolve and are evaluating our schedules all the time. If there are any changes that we think may affect our customers, we will update our travel alerts page here - https://t.co/9NQ0MQVJYe. I hope that helps - Jay
@CKM1959 Hi CKM, I'm sorry to hear that you haven't received your credit voucher yet. The turnaround time is 14 business days from the date of request. Thanks - Leslie
@AshleyMaw4 Hi, @AshleyMaw4. Thank you for reaching out, sorry to hear that you still did not receive your refund, we'd like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message. Thanks - Dan
@kirstylee5 Hi Kirsty, our refunds usually take within 15 business days. Glad that you have yours in a week! Thanks - Bree

@Griml3xx Hey Kangarubick_LFC, That specific flight is still available on our website and is scheduled to depart. If you have specific booking, please send us a DM here. We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Norine

@redsash1993 Hi @redsash1993, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’ll see what we can do to get you on your way to Melbourne. – Ralph.

@AMS1b Hi there Anne, I can see here that a case was already created for you, and our Customer Care department sent you an email last June 8. If you need further discussion, you can reply to that email and they will be able to investigate it further within 10 business days. -Lee
@ferriscarroll75 Hi Ferris, I'm sorry to hear about what happened. Would you mind sending us a DM for us to help you with your concern? Thanks - Ryan

data.text: @ferriscarroll75 Hi @ferriscarroll75, we've extended credit vouchers issued as a result of COVID-19 disruptions to have an expiry month of December 2022. You can find out more by visiting - https://t.co/pJEJWfuSYq or feel free to DM us if you need further assistance. Thanks - Dan

data.text: @Japan_m_Shah Hi @Japan_m_Shah, I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, please DM us and provide your booking details. Thanks – Dan
@emmy_pearce Hi, @emmy_pearce. Thank you for reaching out. Sorry to hear that the flight was cancelled. We'd like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message. - Dan
@Fl_ukey Hi Luke, sorry to hear you’ve had trouble reaching us. We’re able via DM now, so please send through your booking reference and name so we can check this out for you. Thanks – Jaya

@MRBlundellPE Currently, our flight going to Launceston from Melbourne starts on August 09th. You can check our websites from time to time for any updates on availability as they are subject to changes. Thank you -Lee
@MRBlundellPE Hi Mark, we do have availability for that route in the Month of August. For any flight disruptions, we do our best to providing recovery options. Thanks! -Lee
@blu_boys Hi there, I'm sorry to hear that. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this. Thanks - Leslie

@staceypamelaa Hey Stacey, there’s nothing we like more than hearing that one of our passengers has had a great flight experience. Thanks for letting us know! We’ll definitely pass this on to them, they’ll be stoked to hear it. - Jaya

@Critica1_ma55 Hi @Critica1_ma55, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info with your full name and booking number? We’ll see what we can do. – Ralph.
@nhpwheritor Hi, we know how inconvenient canceled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? Thanks. -Lee

@Tr1C1A_55 Hi @Tr1C1A_55, if you’ve already opted for a voucher, we’re unable to convert it to cash. Cash refunds are only available in specific circumstances. If you need to discuss a specific booking DM (Direct Message) us to speak with an agent. Thanks – Ralph.

@bigjsl Hi John, clearly this is very important to you. We appreciate your feedback. You can also check your flight details via our manage my booking page on this link https://t.co/FJePpLklEj. Thanks – Dan
@bigjsl Hey John, sorry to hear you’ve had trouble reaching us. We’re able via DM now, so please send through your booking reference and name so we can check this out for you. Thanks – Jaya
@77magalicious Hi Mags, I appreciate you're having trouble requesting for the options. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can assist you on this? Thanks - Bree
@ChristinegM63 Hi ChrisM, I'm sorry to hear that your mum's flight has been cancelled. Please send us a DM so we can look into her options and assist. Thanks - Leslie

urls.title: Health While Flying | Jetstar
urls.description: Find information on how we're keeping you healthy when you fly with Jetstar. Our Fly Well program is designed to protect you at the airport and on the plane.

data.text: @TylerTryhard Hi Tyler, the use of masks is mandatory on all domestic flights within New Zealand, except where a medical exemption exists. You can find out more about the wellbeing measures we have in place to keep our passengers and team members safe here https://t.co/cwrPdHxoTV. Thanks, RN.
@taylorannmorgan Hi Taylor, would you mind sending us a DM with your booking details? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jay

@staceypamelaa Hi, I'm sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled. we know how inconvenient it can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Please send us a DM here so we can check this further for you. We’ll see what we can do to get you on your way to Christchurch. – Jaya

urls.title: Cheap Flights | Jetstar
urls.description: Famous low airfares. Great destinations. Discover our domestic and international network across Australia, New Zealand, Asia and the Pacific.

data.text: @MattheaElise Hi Matthea, I can see that the latest flight available is on the 16 August from Melbourne (Tullamarine) to Uluru. Flights are subject for availability, and we are continuously reviewing our networks. You can always check on our website at https://t.co/4eYTB3X1JH. Thanks - Bree

data.text: @joeopped Hi Joeopp, I appreciate how this upsets you. If you booked a holiday package, our Jetstar Holidays team can assist you. You may contact them here: https://t.co/2FptGHJHgK. Thanks - Bree

@sofistic8ed Hi Denise, I know how inconvenient it is when flights get cancelled or changed. Could you send us a DM of your booking details so we can take a look into the options for you? Thanks - Bree
@MerryMegsy Your feedback is very important to us and that’s the kind of feedback we love to hear, Megan. Hope to see you onboard soon. Thanks  – Ryan
@emmastacey_ We'd like to help and check this out for you Emma. Please send us a DM of your booking reference number and complete name, please? -Lee

@MerryMegsy Hi Megan, Sorry to hear your flight got cancelled. I know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM here? We’d love the chance to chat with you about this and see what we can do. Thanks - Norine

@stublogs Hi @stublogs, sorry if changes may occur due to the border restrictions. We are monitoring our network to check the availability of our flights. If changes may occur, our passengers will be notified ASAP and options will be provided. Thanks - Ryan

@LyntonDavies Hi Lynton, we know how inconvenient canceled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. You will be contacted by our team directly with a range of options, including refunds. If you need to discuss a specific booking, please send us a DM.  -Lee

@_ksjack Hi @_ksjack, thanks for getting in touch. That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have. Could you please send us a DM with your booking reference so we can look into this further? Thanks - Ryan
@izzhargreaves We'd like to check the options for you, Isabella. Please send us a DM of your booking reference number and complete name, please? -Lee

@stephcooper95 Thanks, Stephanie. Please send us a direct message here as we're unable to assist you via post.  We'd also recommend you delete your original tweet as it contains your personal details. Thanks - Jaya
@stephcooper95 Hi Stephanie, thanks for reaching out. We'd like to check this further for you. Please send us a direct message with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Jaya
@Aulify Hi Aulia, I'm sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled. Please send us a DM so we can look into your options and assist. Thanks - Leslie

data.text: @DANEX873 Hi, Dane. You’ll always be eligible for a credit voucher for the full value of your booking if your Jetstar flight is cancelled or affected by border restriction changes. You can stay up to date via our Travel Alerts page here - https://t.co/9NQ0MQVJYe. Thanks - Jay
@VBieler That’s the kind of feedback we love to hear, Vicki. Thanks for letting us know. - Leslie
@DogtoothTyrant Hi, @DogtoothTyrant. I am sorry to hear about your cancelled flight. Please send us a DM if you need further assistance on your flight. - Jay

urls.title: Jetstar Airways - Australia | Jetstar
urls.description: Rather be on holiday? Book flights at jetstar.com to get there with the lowest fares guaranteed, backed by our Price Beat Guarantee. Conditions apply. Jetstar – All day, every day, low fares.

data.text: @AmleshN Hi @AmleshN. We do have selected flights that are operating between Australia and New Zealand, you can check our website https://t.co/GysIpkvrZF to check the list of flights available. Thanks - Dan
@DanaellaWivell Hi, Danaella. I am sorry to hear about his cancelled flight. Could you please DM us so we can assist? - Jay

@donna_schepis Hi Donna, I appreciate that you're having trouble trying to request for a voucher. Would you mind to send us a PM so we can assist you on this? Just type in INV585 to speak with an agent. Thanks - Bree
@lazybass1973 Hi, @lazybass1973. Thank you for reaching out. We'd like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message. Thanks - Dan
@Guesty22 Hi Matt, I appreciate you want to add additional carry on baggage. Can you send us a DM with your booking reference and full name so we can assist you on this? Thanks - Bree

@ffrizeh Hi Faeze, we do understand how important this is to you. We are monitoring our networks. If we need to cancel your flight due to the restrictions, we will notify you with options. If you want to discuss this further, please send us DM with your booking reference. Thanks - Ryan

@ffrizeh Hi Faeze, I appreciate that you'd prefer a refund rather than a voucher. It may help to know that customers affected by cancellations will be contacted by our team directly with a range of options, which may include a refund depending on the circumstances. Thanks - Leslie

@dlturbo996 Hi, David. Sorry to hear that you was not able to cancel your booking online. We'd like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message and provide your full name on the booking together with the booking reference number. Thanks - Dan

@LilyGean Hi @LilyGean, sorry to hear that you was not able to contact us. Please send us a Direct Message and include your full name as listed on your booking and the booking reference number. Thanks - Dan
